markdown:
'''Myrlesfen the Truly Insane''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The Captain of ''[The Ironclad](/theIronclad/)'', Myrlesfen anchors his ship out in the southwest of the archipelago, flying his custom colors.
